thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Jo Dimock
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Jo Dimock

author: Jo Dimock
title: Jo Dimock
text: I ordered some cute winter boots. They took 1 1/2 months to get here so please be patient. I contacted customer service and without hesitation, they sent me another pair. Of course two days later, the original order came in so I was advised to reject the replacement order. Then I tried them on...and my toes came right to the end. They were a size too small. Unfortunately, they didn't have a bigger size and was advised that shipping them back would be expensive, so I'll find someone with smaller feet and sell or give them away. Crystal my rep was kind, professional and a pleasure to work with. I ordered 2 pairs of sandals and will be more careful about sizing. I will order from Banggood again. Good quality.
